subject: Holding of Executive Committee meetings.
text: HRaly ricy  TTTHTf  wfearut &H1I Phone 91-11.25074100/25074200 545 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (er 9ta7 3 toTArf +AT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3-5 v 6, Ha-10, Eraw , 78 farit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/230/2007-Coord. 27th November 2015 CIRCULAR In supersession to ecrlier circulars on conduct of Executive Committee meetings, it has been decided that henceforth Executive Committee meetings shall be held On every Wednesday at 12.00 pm_ In case of holiday/non- availability of sore Members, the meeting will be   re-scheduled as per convenience of comrittee members: 2 Following instructions are issued for submission approval of proposals in the Executive Committee meetings for compliance: (i) After @ decision is taken by the Member to place the matter before Executive Committee, the agenda shall be approved by CGM, who will preserit the same before-Executive Committee. (T_) Agenda iterns should be very brief and in standard format (maximum of to 2 pages only): A copy of format for submission of proposals in future meetings is also enclosed as Annexure_ (ii) Eight copies of duly approved agenda item along with copy of approval of Competent Authority shall be forwarded to CGM (Coord:) _ (iv) Each pcige of the agenda note should be authenticated by the concerned CGM GM and for all information relating to agenda note, corcerned GM CGM will be responsible for the accuracy of the agenda note. 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. (A.K: Singh) Chief General Manager (Coord,) To All officers at HQs. to; All Members CVO PS to Chairman HrIH NHAD Copy
